name: permeable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a substance is permeable, it allows liquids or gases to go through it: Certain types of sandstone are permeable to water. The solvent passes through the permeable membrane to the solution. Soft and gas-permeable contact lenses are kinder to the eyes than hard lenses. Opposite
impermeable
